languageconverterapi-desc: Adds an action API module to convert between variants of a language
apihelp-languageconvert-summary: Convert text between language variants using LanguageConverter.
apihelp-languageconvert-param-lang: The language whose variants to convert between.
apihelp-languageconvert-param-variants: The language variants to convert to. If unspecified, converts to all available variants.
